Package com.redis.ds.ds_redis.search

Class SearchCriteria

java.lang.Object
com.redis.ds.ds_redis.search.SearchCriteria
public class SearchCriteria extends Object
This is a helper class for the RediSearch data source and should not be invoked by applications. Its purpose is to build and execute queries against the search index.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SearchCriteria(RedisDS aRedisDS, RedisSearch aRedisSearch)
    Constructor accepts a Redis data source parameter and initializes the search criteria objects accordingly.

    • SearchCriteria

      public SearchCriteria(RedisDS aRedisDS, RedisSearch aRedisSearch)
      Constructor accepts a Redis data source parameter and initializes the search criteria objects accordingly.

  • Method Details

    • criteriaToQueryString

      public String criteriaToQueryString(com.redis.foundation.ds.DSCriteria aDSCriteria, com.redis.foundation.data.DataItem aHighlightItem, com.redis.foundation.data.DataItem aSnippetItem) throws RedisDSException
      Converts a data source criteria instance into a RediSearch query string. The highlight data item identifies if the RediSearch highlighting feature should be enabled and the snippet data item describes how large a highlighted snippet should be.
      Parameters:
      aDSCriteria - Data source criteria instance
      aHighlightItem - Highlighting data item instance
      aSnippetItem - Snippet data item instance
      Returns:
      RediSearch query string
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source exception

    • getHighlightOpenTag

      public String getHighlightOpenTag()
      Retrieves the highlighting open tag string.
      Returns:
      Highlighting open tag string

    • getHighlightCloseTag

      public String getHighlightCloseTag()
      Retrieves the highlighting close tag string.
      Returns:
      Highlighting close tag string

    • searchResultToDataGrid

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid searchResultToDataGrid(redis.clients.jedis.search.SearchResult aSearchResult)
      Converts a RediSearch search result instance into a data grid instance. This methond handles both JSON and Hash document types.
      Parameters:
      aSearchResult - RediSearch result instance
      Returns:
      Data grid instance

    • execute

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid execute(com.redis.foundation.ds.DSCriteria aDSCriteria, int anOffset, int aLimit) throws RedisDSException
      Executes a RediSearch query based on the data source criteria instance using the page offset and total document limits.
      Parameters:
      aDSCriteria - Data source criteria instance
      anOffset - Starting page offset
      aLimit - Total documents returned limit
      Returns:
      Data grid instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source exception

    • execute

      Parameters:

    • createAggregateUIResultGrid

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid createAggregateUIResultGrid()

      Data grid instance

    • aggregate

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aggregate(com.redis.foundation.ds.DSCriteria aDSCriteria, boolean aFormatForUIPresentation) throws RedisDSException
      Executes a RediSearch aggregation query based on the data source criteria instance. If the output is targeted for a UI presentation, then the data grid will be formatted accordingly.
      Parameters:
      aDSCriteria - Data source criteria instance
      aFormatForUIPresentation - UI presentation flag
      Returns:
      Data grid instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source exception
